alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 17 at 2:49PM AKDT until October 20 at 1:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wind shift from light northerly to strong southerly will occur late Tuesday into early Wednesday followed by increasing potential for high gusts through the day Wednesday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
